promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic mantis dark-type pokemon with ancient wings. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or mantis. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Castiquill, a a chibi cute basic mantis dark-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Push Aside, Darkness Charge. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "mantis", "dark" or "Castiquill". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, mantis-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: Found in fortress regions, this shadowy bug, Castiquill, uses Push Aside and Darkness Charge to easily navigate tight corners. It's reclusive but charming.
